OOC: You've said about the same things everyone else has with a few excepti=
ons.

I didn't expect you to hate me, I was quoting Hardcore Holly.

And I =
didn't call YOU tyrannical, I said that we might as well have a tyrannical =
ruler instead of a US President. I choose my words carefully.

It wasn't a =
threat, I cannot be moderated. I can be thrown out, but not moderated...

 =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: x_rauq_x 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
  Sent: Monday, May 06, 2002 10:53 PM
  Subject: Re: New poll for nbwrp=
g


  *sigh*

  Were you just waiting for me to do something you didn't lik=
e to cut 
  me down? Sure looks like it. You also seem to like to say that =
ego 
  dominates all, which I will deny, and will deny time and time again.=
 
  You don't know me well enough to judge me. Comparing me to Zardus is 
 =
 uncalled for, and wrong. We are two completely different people, who 
  ha=
ve different personalities, and think differently. For me to try 
  to be s=
omeone I'm not is impossible. I can't help it if you feel i'm 
  not Zardus=
, cause I'm not.

  Fault should not be so frivolously tossed around. Yes, =
I did make 
  Azure a moderator, after a 100% moderator vote. He has, as Ru=
drak 
  has said, been a moderator for a few months now. When you say that =

  not everyone voted for him to be a moderator, you are entirely 
  correc=
t. But by my judgement, and by anyone who understands how a 
  vote works, =
7-10 people isn't enough for a vote to be taken 
  seriously at all. 

  Hu=
gar had been inactive for two months. Moderators shouldn't 
  disappear for=
 two months. I know that he's around cause I have him 
  as a contact on an=
 IM prog.

  Kyle does tend to abuse the polls more than others, and that c=
hange 
  of rules does affect him more than others, but any member of the r=
pg 
  who wants a poll, ANY poll, can still email it too me, and i'll put 
=
  it up quickly. Trillian (my chat prog) tells me when I have mail, 
  thus=
 allowing me to hop on my comp and create a poll at any time.

  Tyrannical=
? Your pointing finger sticks out too far. I will never be 
  a US presiden=
t, and nor would I ever want to. 

  <<Oh, you can moderate me if you want,=
 but if you do, I'll leave, 
  and I won't ever come back.>>

  You say tha=
t line so much it has become irritating. It's like 
  saying "I won't be yo=
ur friend if you don't give me that candy". 
  Like laying down a guilt lin=
e in hopes of getting some attention. I 
  don't want you to leave -- I don=
't want anyone to leave -- but if 
  you choose to go, I can't and won't st=
op you. Just don't run away 
  from situations which you don't like.

  How=
 do I like you now? Are you asking me to hate you so you can 
  justify you=
r words? No, I won't do that. I don't hate anyone, and 
  there is nothing =
you can say or do that would make me hate you, or 
  anyone else for that m=
atter. Perhaps that is a little boastful, but 
  I've been living my life l=
ike that for many years now.

  Ack, this will probably further the argueme=
nt... oh well, some stuff 
  needs to be said.


  --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Hol=
lywood Narrator" <thecode@p...> wrote:
  > OOC: I know I haven't posted in =
a while, due to a lack of ideas 
  for the RPG, but I couldn't sit back any=
more, I have to comment on 
  this because it's just the way I am. Warrior =
Azure, I do not think 
  you're a bad guy. In fact, this isn't even your fa=
ult, it's rAuq's 
  fault. I am not saying Warrior Azure does not deserve t=
o be a 
  moderator, but he wasn't voted in by the RPG. Let's face it, rAuq=
, 
  you stepped in suddenly, and without even asking the RPG if they 
  th=
ought this stuff was appropriate, you fling a bunch of new shit 
  all over=
 everyone. Some stupid new poll rule because of Dewboy, 
  first of all, wh=
ich wasn't fair. Unitron (Sorry, can't remember the 
  other name, it being=
 new and all, and I love Unicron rip offs!) is 
  absolutely correct about =
this when he said that we're all being 
  punished for something dipshit (D=
ewboy) did. Second, Hugar is thrown 
  off the council by someone who was v=
oted in for EQUAL POWER. You 
  threw off someone of EQUAL POWER, rAuq, and=
 without the people 
  voting for it. The people of the RPG are allowed to =
make this choice 
  for a reason. Zardus thought it would make the RPG a be=
tter 
  community, and it has. It is stupid to try to revoke the people's 
=
  privileges. We might as well have a tyrannical ruler instead of a US 
  P=
resident! Then without the people voting him in, we have Warrior 
  Azure a=
s a moderator. I am in no way saying he won't make a good 
  moderator, but=
 that still is not the point. He wasn't voted into 
  office. He just is su=
ddenly assigned to the position because "rAuq 
  says so" WHATSUPWITHAT!?!?=
 This seems to be a matter of someone's 
  head getting a little too big, m=
aybe. Oh, you can moderate me if you 
  want, but if you do, I'll leave, an=
d I won't ever come back. What's 
  important is that I stood up for what i=
s right. Hugar shouldn't have 
  been kicked off, moderators should be vote=
d into office, and this 
  dumbass poll rule should not have come into effe=
ct. And that is the 
  bottom line. How do you like me now?...



   

  Yo=
ur use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
